transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello. Ji, sir aapko bas haan mai aapko pehle samjhati hu.

Customer: Meri baat sun lo, puri baat sun lo aap meri, fir aapne aap bolti rehna, mujhe jo sunna hoga, sun lunga. Suno meri baat. Jo mera dost tha na, usne pehle to service ke bare me baat ki hai sir, jab wo lene ke liye soch raha tha. Thik hai? Fir aapke ek, aapki team ne bol diya tha, hamara ek account manager wagera hota hai, unse baat kar lena, fir unko service ke liye puch lena. Jab usi ne samjhai thi, employee ho, chahe manager ho, chahe koi ho. Aapke paas to told, told kharido, bas isliye pucha tha ki kya plan hai, kaisi, fir aapki wo link bheji thi unhone, isme dekh lo sare plan. To usne dekh liya, fir aapke hai na team ke bande ka ek phone aaya tha. Fir usne bataya tha sab kuch. Ab aisa mujhe pata hai nahi isne naam wagera kya bata. To fir maine kahi ki thik hai. To usne hi bataya tha usko ke hai na, aise 50 lead alag milti hai.

Executive: Thik hai, ab mai batau sir aapko kuch chize. Aap jo 9696 pe call karte hai, wo aap company ko nahi bolte, jo aapko naya account manager hai uske against khul jati hai complaint. Ki uske liye aapne complaint kiya hai, thik hai? Pehli chiz. Dusri chiz sir, 9696 pe call tab kiya jata hai jab aapke paas account manager na ho. Thik hai? Ki agar aapka kisi se baat nahi ho pa raha. Aap jo bar bar 9696 call kar rahe hai to usse jo account manager unke upar complaint aa ja rahi hai, thik hai?

Customer: Dusri chiz sir, aapko agar 50

Executive: Mujhe pata chal gaya na, Bhumika mam ab manager hai.

Executive: Haan, haan, unhone aapko WhatsApp bhi number kar diya hai. Ab jo 50 lead ka hai sir, aap 50 lead ka aapko kahi likh ke diya hoga na unhone ki wo 50 lead hai. Aap mujhe instantly de dijiye, mai abhi instantly aapka karwa deti hu.

Customer: Ab rukna ek minute, abhi mai dhoond bhi leta hu, thik hai?

Executive: Haan, dhundiye.

Customer: Bhumika mam se baat karke karwa lunga abhi, thik hai? Par mujhe chahiye warna account band rahega wo.

Executive: Meri baat, thik hai aap karwa lijiyega.

Customer: Kuch nahi, kuch nahi hoga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says he was promised 50 leads.

- Wants the promised leads or account closure.

- Complains about calling 9696 number.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the complaint process.

- Asked customer to provide proof of promised leads.

- Offered to resolve the issue instantly.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will search for proof of promised leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, complaint, resolution

seller_categories.mcat_name: Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
